00010 
00011 #ifndef _KLONE_VA_H_
00012 #define _KLONE_VA_H_
00013 
00014 #include "klone_conf.h"
00015 #include <u/libu.h>
00016 #include <stdarg.h>
00017 
00018 /* provide some suitable method for performing C99 va_copy */
00019 #if defined(va_copy)
00020     /* C99 va_copy */
00021     #define kl_va_copy(a, b)  va_copy(a, b)
00022 #elif defined(__va_copy)
00023     /* GNU libc va_copy replacement */
00024     #define kl_va_copy(a, b)  __va_copy(a, b)
00025 #else
00026     #define VA_COPY_UNAVAIL 1
00027 #endif
00028 
00029 #endif  /* !_KLONE_VA_H_ */
